item.title: Helpato FAQ
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
• Edit
  • Duplicate
  • Remove
Questions

FAQ

Got a question? We've got answers. If you have some other questions, see our support center.

What payment services do you support?

We accept all major credit cards.

Can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.

Can I try Helpato for free?

Of course! We’re happy to offer a free plan to anyone who wants to try our support system. There is no credit card required; you get access to all our great features; and if you choose to upgrade to a paid plan, you can keep all of your data too!

What if I want to change plans?

It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard. Changes to your account will happen in real-time and any fees will be changed accordingly.

How long are your contracts?

Currently, we only offer monthly subscription. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation. Yearly subscription with generous discount will become available soon.

Why do you ask for several permissions in login?

Envato API requires us to ask for these permissions to have the ability to get your details, items, purchased items, etc. on your behalf. We take privacy extremely seriously, and will never send messages, or access your data for anything other than our stated purposes.

Are you affiliated with Envato?

No, we are not affliated or supported by Envato.

Can I get refund?

Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.

item.title: Senior Front-end Engineer
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Use your extensive knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to improve our web client, a complex in-browser application relied upon by millions of users every day. You will work with real-time data streams, engineer for performance across browsers, and delight people by making the best software we can imagine. You will collaborate closely with Product, Design, Application Engineering, and QA to spec, build, test and deploy new features. This position reports directly to the Director of Frontend Engineering.

 
A Typical Week
  • You'll brainstorm with Product Managers and Designers to conceptualize new features
  • You'll collaborate with Application Engineering to build new features for our large-and-growing user base
  • You'll learn about new web technologies and discuss potential solutions to problems
  • You'll help our skilled support team triage bugs and troubleshoot production issues
  • You'll mentor other engineers and deeply review code
Requirements
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.
  • 3+ years of experience writing client-side JavaScript
  • Expertise in building complex layouts with CSS and HTML
  • Experience building and debugging complex systems in a team environment
  • Experience with modern browser technologies
  • Strong UX and design sensibilities, and a desire to sweat the small stuff
  • Strong communication skills, a positive attitude, and empathy
  • Self-­awareness and a desire to continually improve
Bonus Points
  • Experience with jQuery, Handlebars, or LESS
  • Experience investigating and improving JavaScript performance
  • Experience with WebSockets, Local Storage, or ES6
  • Experience in small start­up environments
  • Experience designing web sites or applications
How To Apply
Send your complete resume and a link to your online portfolio to jobs@thetheme.io. Include [Resume] keyword in your subject.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Built for

Built for


TheSaaS is an elegant, modern and fully customizable WordPress theme for your SaaS or Startup

TheSaaS is an elegant, modern and fully customizable WordPress theme for your SaaS or Startup



Purchase Now - $59
or purchase an Extended License
Demo

Sample Landing Pages

Apart from internal pages, we have designed several single sample pages to get start with.

Bootstrap

Slack

Trello

Gmail

Skype

Mobile App

GitHub

Helpato

Drag & Drop Page Builder


Design your pages in few minutes! TheSaaS uses the Elementor drag and drop page builder with a huge collection of blocks. You just drag and drop blocks into your page, modify content and save your pages!


Watch a video
Features

Header Varieties

We waited until we could do it right. Then we did! Instead of creating a carbon copy.

  • Color
  • Gradient
  • Typing
  • Image
  • Video


Features

Full, Faster, Functional

Completely leverage other's covalent products whereas covalent manufactured products.

30+

Pages

2.4x

Faster

6

Header



Own it

Get it now

If you have visited the other pages and you have made your decision to purchase this template, go on and press the following button and get a license in less than a minute.

Purchase for $59
or purchase an Extended License

Features

Great Combination

Holisticly implement fully tested process improvements rather than dynamic internal.

Responsive

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Customizable

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

UI Elements

There is a bunch of useful and necessary elements for developing your website.

Clean Code

You can find our code well organized, commented and readable.

Documented

As you can see in the source code, we provided a comprehensive documentation.

Free Updates

When you purchase this template, you'll freely receive future updates.



See more features

Do you need a customization for your template?

Request customization

Perfect for Your Business

Energistically transform pandemic manufactured products whereas premier solutions. Compellingly streamline an expanded array of web-readiness rather.


Responsive

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Customizable

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

Unlimited Layout Option

Energistically transform pandemic manufactured products whereas premier solutions. Compellingly streamline an expanded array of web-readiness rather.


MailChimp integration included

Develop pages like lego

Dozen of colors for elements

item.title: Choose Your Pricing Plan
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Choose Your Pricing Plan

We waited until we could do it right

Single


free


30 days free trial
Basic support
Sync to cloud database

Get started

Studio


$ 39 /mo


30 days free trial
Basic support
Sync to cloud database

Get started

Business


$ 69 /mo


30 days free trial
Basic support
Sync to cloud database

Get started

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Drop us an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question in the following list.

What is TheSaaS?

It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

How long does it take?

It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

What payment services do you support?

We accept all major credit cards.

Can I update my card details?

Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.

Can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.

Can I get refund?

Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.

What if I want to change plans?

It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard.

How long are your contracts?

You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.

Other questions?

We're always available at support@domain.com

It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

","_id":"kn1c34r"},{"question":"How long does it take?","answer":"

It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

","_id":"ww2vhvv"},{"question":"What payment services do you support?","answer":"

We accept all major credit cards.

","_id":"wwchq7v"},{"question":"Can I update my card details?","answer":"

Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.

","_id":"139bsp3"},{"question":"Can I cancel my subscription?","answer":"

You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.

","_id":"25hmux7"},{"question":"Can I get refund?","answer":"

Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.

","_id":"ph1m3t7"},{"question":"What if I want to change plans?","answer":"

It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard.

","_id":"66yllsr"},{"question":"How long are your contracts?","answer":"

You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.

","_id":"8wpncov"},{"question":"Other questions?","answer":"

We're always available at support@domain.com

","_id":"azmukcx"}],"t2_small_text":"FAQ","t2_header_text":"General","t2_lead_text":"Send an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question here.","t2_faqs":[{"question":"What is TheSaaS?","answer":"It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.","_id":"u9dih0m"},{"question":"How long are your contracts?","answer":"You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.","_id":"u9z839f"}]},"elements":[],"widgetType":"the-faq"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

FAQ

License

Send an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question here.

What is reqular license?
What is extended license?

Extended license can be used for end products (web service or SAAS) that charges users for access or service (e.g: monthly subscription fee). Single extended license can be used for single end product and end product can be used by you or your client. If you want to sell end product to multiple clients then you will need to purchase separate extended license for each client. The same rule applies if you want to use the same end product on multiple domains (unique setup).

Where can I find your Terms of Service (TOS)?

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
About Us

Find out about our mission, services and meet our great team

Our Mission

Energistically transform pandemic manufactured products whereas premier solutions. Compellingly streamline an expanded array of web-readiness rather.


Deliver a high quality web design

Support our customers once signing a contract

Streamline an expanded array of web

Pursue web-enabled niche markets with professionals

What we offer

Services

We are so excited and proud of our product. It's really easy to create a landing page for your awesome product.

Web Design

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Logo Design

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

Branding

There is a bunch of useful and necessary elements for developing your website.

Marketing

You can find our code well organized, commented and readable.

Advertising

As you can see in the source code, we provided a comprehensive documentation.

Support

When you purchase this template, you'll freely receive future updates.

Team

Who We Are

Meet the team working to make customer support simpler for you.

Morgan Guadis Co-Founder & CEO

item.title: Let's Get In Touch
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Let's Get In Touch

Here are the ways you can contact us with any questions you have

We received your message and will contact you back soon.

Give us a call or stop by our door anytime, we try to answer all enquiries within 24 hours on business days.

We are open from 9am - 5pm week days.

652 Main Road, Apt 12
New York, USA 10033

E: info@domain.com P: +1 (123) 456-7890

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
General Information
We collect the e-mail addresses of those who communicate with us via e-mail, aggregate information on what pages consumers access or visit, and information volunteered by the consumer (such as survey information and/or site registrations). The information we collect is used to improve the content of our Web pages and the quality of our service, and is not shared with or sold to other organizations for commercial purposes, except to provide products or services you’ve requested, when we have your permission, or under the following circumstances:
  • It is necessary to share information in order to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person, violations of Terms of Service, or as otherwise required by law.
  • We transfer information about you if TheSaaS is acquired by or merged with another company. In this event, TheSaaS will notify you before information about you is transferred and becomes subject to a different privacy policy.
 
Information Gathering and Usage
  • When you register for TheSaaS we ask for information such as your name, email address, billing address, credit card information. Members who sign up for the free account are not required to enter a credit card.
  • TheSaaS uses collected information for the following general purposes: products and services provision, billing, identification and authentication, services improvement, contact, and research.
 
Cookies
  • A cookie is a small amount of data, which often includes an anonymous unique identifier, that is sent to your browser from a web site’s computers and stored on your computer’s hard drive.
  • Cookies are required to use the TheSaaS service.
  • We use cookies to record current session information, but do not use permanent cookies. You are required to re-login to your TheSaaS account after a certain period of time has elapsed to protect you against others accidentally accessing your account contents.
 
Data Storage
TheSaaS uses third party vendors and hosting partners to provide the necessary hardware, software, networking, storage, and related technology required to run TheSaaS. Although TheSaaS owns the code, databases, and all rights to the TheSaaS application, you retain all rights to your data.  
Disclosure
TheSaaS may disclose personally identifiable information under special circumstances, such as to comply with subpoenas or when your actions violate the Terms of Service.  
Changes
TheSaaS may periodically update this policy. We will notify you about significant changes in the way we treat personal information by sending a notice to the primary email address specified in your TheSaaS primary account holder account or by placing a prominent notice on our site. Such notice will be given at least 3 days in advance of the date the new policy will be applied.  
Question
Any questions about this Privacy Policy should be addressed to privacy@domain.com.

item.title: Call to action blocks
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Call to action blocks

Develop your pages by drag and drop ready blocks

Call to action 1

Join over 1,000 companies that trust us.

Try it yourself 30 days free. No credit card required!

Design your site now
Call to action 2

Want a bite? You're in the right place!

Take a test drive
Call to action 3


Become an Outstanding Startup

Try it yourself 30 days free. No credit card required! A good news is that you have 15 days money back!


Start now
Call to action 4

20,000+ companies are using our templates every day!

Get Started
Call to action 5


Download now

Continually e-enable vertical schemas with top-line infomediaries. Energistically restore real-time core competencies and compelling leadership skills.

Based on 3,000+ reviews

Call to action 6

Get it now


We waited until we could do it right. Then we did! Instead of creating a carbon copy.



Call to action 7
Start the supporting system that you always dreamed about
Login with envato
Call to action 8
Meet TheSaaS

30 Days Free Trial

We waited until we could do it right. Then we did! Instead of creating a carbon copy.

Try it now
You'll login using your Envato account.

Call to action 9
Own it

Get it now

If you have visited the other pages and you have made your decision to purchase this template, go on and press the following button and get a license in less than a minute.

Purchase for $19
or purchase an Extended License

item.title: Textual feature blocks
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Textual feature blocks

Develop your pages by drag and drop ready blocks

Textual feature 1
Features

So Intuitive, So Easy

We are so excited and proud of our product. It's really easy to create a landing page for your awesome product.

Responsive

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Customizable

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

UI Kit

There is a bunch of useful and necessary elements for developing your website.

Lego Base

You can find our code well organized, commented and readable.

Clean Code

As you can see in the source code, we provided a comprehensive documentation.

Support

When you purchase this template, you'll freely receive future updates.

Textual feature 2

More Features

We are so excited and proud of our product. It's really easy to create a landing page for your awesome product.

Works great in all modern browsers

Based on Bootstrap framework 4

Elements with multiple colors

Very well code documentation

Variety of sample landing pages

Free updates forever

item.title: Feature blocks
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Feature blocks

Develop your pages by drag and drop ready blocks

Feature 1
Features

Great Combination

Holisticly implement fully tested process improvements rather than dynamic internal.

Responsive

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Customizable

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

UI Elements

There is a bunch of useful and necessary elements for developing your website.

Clean Code

Documented

item.title: Helpato - Support System for Themeforest Authors
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Built for Authors,
Developed by an Author

Built for Authors,
Developed by an Author


Helpato is an item support system for Themeforest authors included ticketing system, forums, articles, and FAQs.

Helpato is an item support system for Themeforest authors included ticketing system, forums, articles, and FAQs.


Login using envato

Serve a Better Support

Helpato equipped with several supporting tools. Each of those not only help you give your customers and potential customers a better experience, but also it will reduce support requests and saves your precious time.



Ticket

Allow your customers to send you a private ticket (maybe with their sensitive data) and ask for help.

Forum

Your customers as well as potential buyers can create a public topic to get in touch with you and each other.

Envato Integration

We have used the Envato API in our development to reduce all the burden of you and your customers.


Login using your Envato account

Your items will import automatically

Your customers doesn't need to provide purchase code

Identify if a customer has a valid support

Start the supporting system that you always dreamed about
Login with envato
Plans

Pricing

Choose any of the following plans to get start with. You can start with the FREE plan to see our web application at first. You can always change your plan from your account.

Free


0


1 Agent
1 Item Support
100 MB Attachment

Get started

Personal


$ 9


1 Agent
10 Item Support
10 GB Attachment

Get started

Team


$ 39


5 Agent
25 Item Support
100 GB Attachment

Get started

Questions

FAQ

Got a question? We've got answers. If you have some other questions, see our support center.

What payment services do you support?
Can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.

Is this a secure site for purchases?

Absolutely! We work with Stripe which guarantees your safety and security. All site communication and data transfer are secured and encrypted.

Can I update my card details?

Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.

Can I try Helpato for free?

Of course! We’re happy to offer a free plan to anyone who wants to try our support system. There is no credit card required; you get access to all our great features; and if you choose to upgrade to a paid plan, you can keep all of your data too!

What if I want to change plans?

It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard. Changes to your account will happen in real-time and any fees will be changed accordingly.

How long are your contracts?

Currently, we only offer monthly subscription. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation. Yearly subscription with generous discount will become available soon.

Why do you ask for several permissions in login?

Envato API requires us to ask for these permissions to have the ability to get your details, items, purchased items, etc. on your behalf. We take privacy extremely seriously, and will never send messages, or access your data for anything other than our stated purposes.

Are you affiliated with Envato?

No, we are not affliated or supported by Envato.

Can I get refund?

Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.

We've got answers. If you have some other questions, see our support center.","t1_faqs":[{"question":"What payment services do you support?","answer":"","_id":"u5u1828"},{"question":"Can I cancel my subscription?","answer":"

You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.<\/p>","_id":"d937xgc"},{"question":"Is this a secure site for purchases?","answer":"

Absolutely! We work with\u00a0Stripe\u00a0which guarantees your safety and security. All site communication and data transfer are secured and encrypted.<\/p>","_id":"5nsymkf"},{"question":"Can I update my card details?","answer":"

Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.<\/p>","_id":"y0ti7ms"},{"question":"Can I try Helpato for free?","answer":"

Of course! We\u2019re happy to offer a free plan to anyone who wants to try our support system. There is no credit card required; you get access to all our great features; and if you choose to upgrade to a paid plan, you can keep all of your data too!<\/p>","_id":"wil9t8h"},{"question":"What if I want to change plans?","answer":"

It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard. Changes to your account will happen in real-time and any fees will be changed accordingly.<\/p>","_id":"5u5w59h"},{"question":"How long are your contracts?","answer":"

Currently, we only offer monthly subscription. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation. Yearly subscription with generous discount will become available soon.<\/p>","_id":"xz3udz7"},{"question":"Why do you ask for several permissions in login?","answer":"

Envato API requires us to ask for these permissions to have the ability to get your details, items, purchased items, etc. on your behalf. We take privacy extremely seriously, and will never send messages, or access your data for anything other than our stated purposes.<\/p>","_id":"i4k5pky"},{"question":"Are you affiliated with Envato?","answer":"

No, we are not affliated or supported by Envato.<\/p>","_id":"hwjaclt"},{"question":"Can I get refund?","answer":"

Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.<\/p>","_id":"je98y9a"}],"t2_small_text":"FAQ","t2_header_text":"General","t2_lead_text":"Send an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question here.","t2_faqs":[{"question":"What is TheSaaS?","answer":"It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.","_id":"3z4a87z"},{"question":"How long are your contracts?","answer":"You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.","_id":"mhrnfjs"}],"t1_section_id":"faq"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"the-faq"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Trello
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Trello


Trello lets you work more collaboratively and get more done.

Trello


Trello lets you work more collaboratively and get more done.

Create Your Board


From startups to Fortune 500 companies, Trello is the most visual way for teams to collaborate on any project. Uniquely evolve equity invested value vis-a-vis proactive testing procedures. Collaboratively create worldwide results without resource maximizing. Uniquely evolve equity invested value vis-a-vis proactive testing procedures. Collaboratively create worldwide results without resource maximizing.


Get start now

More Than You Think

Dramatically reintermediate effective applications after high-payoff core competencies. Authoritatively optimize collaborative benefits for error-free communities. Dramatically reintermediate effective applications after high-payoff core competencies. Authoritatively optimize collaborative benefits for error-free communities.



Productivity

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Synchronize

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

See it in action

Screenshots

We waited until we could do it right. Then we did! Instead of creating a carbon copy.

  • Login
  • Dashboard
  • Members
  • Calendar


Try it now

It’s Always Free

Sign up for free and become one of the millions of people around the world who have fallen in love with Trello.

Try it now

item.title: Gmail
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Gmail


The ease & simplicity of Gmail, available across devices

Gmail


The ease & simplicity of Gmail, available across devices

Features

All In One

New customizable tabs put you back in control so that you can see what’s new at a glance and decide which emails you want to read and when.

Responsive

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Customizable

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

UI Elements

There is a bunch of useful and necessary elements for developing your website.

Clean Code

You can find our code well organized, commented and readable.

Documented

As you can see in the source code, we provided a comprehensive documentation.

Free Updates

When you purchase this template, you'll freely receive future updates.



See more features

Tips

A better compose

Interactively productize worldwide potentialities before long-term high-impact initiatives. Completely disintermediate excellent leadership skills with client-centric content.


Read more

Collaborative

View attachments instantly

Interactively productize worldwide potentialities before long-term high-impact initiatives. Completely disintermediate excellent leadership skills with client-centric content.


Read more
Gmail

Get Custom Email

Use the Gmail you love – for business. Get custom email @yourcompany.com including calendar, docs, video meetings, and more with access from your phone or tablet.

Get Started

Questions

Frequently Asked Questions

Got a question? We've got answers. If you have some other questions, see our support center.

What payment services do you support?

Can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.

Is this a secure site for purchases?

Absolutely! We work with Stripe which guarantees your safety and security. All site communication and data transfer are secured and encrypted.

Can I update my card details?

Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.

Can I try Helpato for free?

Of course! We’re happy to offer a free plan to anyone who wants to try our support system. There is no credit card required; you get access to all our great features; and if you choose to upgrade to a paid plan, you can keep all of your data too!

What if I want to change plans?

It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard. Changes to your account will happen in real-time and any fees will be changed accordingly.

How long are your contracts?

Currently, we only offer monthly subscription. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation. Yearly subscription with generous discount will become available soon.

Why do you ask for several permissions in login?

Envato API requires us to ask for these permissions to have the ability to get your details, items, purchased items, etc. on your behalf. We take privacy extremely seriously, and will never send messages, or access your data for anything other than our stated purposes.

Are you affiliated with Envato?

No, we are not affliated or supported by Envato.

Can I get refund?

Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.

If you have some other questions, see our support center.","t1_faqs":[{"question":"What payment services do you support?","answer":"","_id":"u5u1828"},{"question":"Can I cancel my subscription?","answer":"

You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.<\/p>","_id":"d937xgc"},{"question":"Is this a secure site for purchases?","answer":"

Absolutely! We work with\u00a0Stripe\u00a0which guarantees your safety and security. All site communication and data transfer are secured and encrypted.<\/p>","_id":"5nsymkf"},{"question":"Can I update my card details?","answer":"

Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.<\/p>","_id":"y0ti7ms"},{"question":"Can I try Helpato for free?","answer":"

Of course! We\u2019re happy to offer a free plan to anyone who wants to try our support system. There is no credit card required; you get access to all our great features; and if you choose to upgrade to a paid plan, you can keep all of your data too!<\/p>","_id":"wil9t8h"},{"question":"What if I want to change plans?","answer":"

It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard. Changes to your account will happen in real-time and any fees will be changed accordingly.<\/p>","_id":"5u5w59h"},{"question":"How long are your contracts?","answer":"

Currently, we only offer monthly subscription. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation. Yearly subscription with generous discount will become available soon.<\/p>","_id":"xz3udz7"},{"question":"Why do you ask for several permissions in login?","answer":"

Envato API requires us to ask for these permissions to have the ability to get your details, items, purchased items, etc. on your behalf. We take privacy extremely seriously, and will never send messages, or access your data for anything other than our stated purposes.<\/p>","_id":"i4k5pky"},{"question":"Are you affiliated with Envato?","answer":"

No, we are not affliated or supported by Envato.<\/p>","_id":"hwjaclt"},{"question":"Can I get refund?","answer":"

Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.<\/p>","_id":"je98y9a"}],"t2_small_text":"FAQ","t2_header_text":"General","t2_lead_text":"Send an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question here.","t2_faqs":[{"question":"What is TheSaaS?","answer":"It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.","_id":"3z4a87z"},{"question":"How long are your contracts?","answer":"You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.","_id":"mhrnfjs"}]},"elements":[],"widgetType":"the-faq"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Skype | Free calls to frends and family
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Make Free Calls

Make Free Calls


Video or voice call anyone in the world, for free. Bring family and friends together on a free group video call.




Download skype Start a conversation
Features

Skype has more features than you think

Synergistically evolve performance based paradigms and future-proof action items. Professionally build multifunctional schemas rather than relationships.

Skype to Skype calls

Video or voice call anyone in the world, for free.
Group video calls

Bring family and friends together on a free group video call.
Instant messaging

Share messages with your partner, or make plans with group of a friends.
Screen sharing

Give great presentations online or show grandma how easy it is to use Skype.

Statistic

Worldwide Adoption

Completely leverage other’s covalent products whereas covalent manufactured products.

190+

Countries

700M

Users

200B

Calls



It's free

Download Skype

Download Skype on your computer, tablet, mobile and more. Or use Skype straight away on your browser.

Download now
or download Browser Extension

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Drop us an email if you couldn’t find an answer to your question in the following list

What is TheSaaS?

It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

Where can I learn more about how to use TheSaaS?

item.title: GitHub
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Built for developers!

Built for developers!


Using the Hello World guide, you’ll create a repository, start a branch, write comments, and open a pull request.




Start a project Find out more
Welcome

Get a Better Understanding

Holisticly implement fully tested process improvements rather than dynamic internal.

Responsive

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Customizable

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

UI Elements

There is a bunch of useful and necessary elements for developing your website.

Clean Code

You can find our code well organized, commented and readable.

Documented

As you can see in the source code, we provided a comprehensive documentation.

Free Updates

When you purchase this template, you'll freely receive future updates.



See more features

Want a bite? You're in the right place!

Take a test drive
Features

More to Discover

We are so excited and proud of our product. It’s really easy to create a landing page for your awesome product.

Getting Started page

Getting Started page As part of efforts to improve user onboarding, I shipped an experiment to a subset of new users showing them a Getting Started page immediately after signup to help them get to what we think are some of the most important actions for new users to take. We compared the subset of users against a control group to see whether such an experience improved engagement over a period of time.



Outdated comments toggling

Last week we shipped outdated comments…well, brought them back, actually. We used to show collapsed comments on outdated diffs as a single line, but removed that when we shipped code review recently. We brought that back last week with an improvement: you can now toggle open threads on outdated diffs in a review individually.



Code review illustrations

Less an illustration, and more a literal proxy. These show up when the feature’s introduced. Monotonectally leverage existing standards compliant ideas with distributed data. Efficiently simplify cross-unit systems whereas adaptive testing. Monotonectally leverage existing standards compliant ideas with distributed data. Efficiently simplify cross-unit systems whereas adaptive testing.

Plans

Pricing

Choose any of the following plans to get start with. You can always change your plan from your account.

Free


0


1 Repository
1 Private Project
100 MB Attachment

Get started

Personal


$ 9


1 Repository
10 Private Project
10 GB Attachment

Get started

Team


$ 19


5 Repository
25 Private Project
100 GB Attachment

Get started

Try it now

Get Started Free

Sign up for free and become one of the millions of people around the world who have fallen in love with GitHub.

item.title: App landing page
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
App Landing Page


The best template for your mobile app to showcase and acquire new customers all around the world. The best template that you can find anywhere!



Download now Features

More Than You Think

Dramatically reintermediate effective applications after high-payoff core competencies. Authoritatively optimize collaborative benefits for error-free communities. Dramatically reintermediate effective applications after high-payoff core competencies. Authoritatively optimize collaborative benefits for error-free communities.



Responsive Design

Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

Clean Code

You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

Endless Features

Interactively maintain vertical portals through competitive strategic theme areas. Collaboratively reintermediate cross-platform data rather than state of the art value.

Fast & easy work

Rapidiously evisculate business markets and cooperative results. Globally leverage other high.

Create result

Rapidiously evisculate business markets and cooperative results. Globally leverage other high.

See it in action

Screenshots

We waited until we could do it right. Then we did! Instead of creating a carbon copy.

People

The Team

Meet out small team that make those great products.

Morgan Guadis Co-Founder & CEO

John Senating Co-Founder & CTO

Sandi Hormez Director


Download now

Continually e-enable vertical schemas with top-line infomediaries. Energistically restore real-time core competencies and compelling leadership skills.

Based on 3,000+ reviews

When you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.


Steve Jobs

Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.


Bill Gates

item.title: Bootstrap
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Bootstrap


The most popular HTML, CSS, and JS framework in the world for building responsive, mobile-first projects on the web.

Download now
Currently v4.0.0-alpha.6

Features

Designed for everyone, everywhere

Bootstrap makes front-end web development faster and easier. It’s made for folks of all skill levels, devices of all shapes, and projects of all sizes.

Preprocessors

Bootstrap ships with vanilla CSS, but its source code utilizes the two most popular CSS preprocessors, Less and Sass. Quickly get started with precompiled CSS.

One framework, every device

Bootstrap easily and efficiently scales your websites and applications with a single code base, from phones to tablets to desktops with CSS media queries.

Full of features

With Bootstrap, you get extensive and beautiful documentation for common HTML elements, dozens of custom HTML and CSS components, and awesome jQuery plugins.


Fork the project on GitHub

Bootstrap is open source! It’s hosted, developed, and maintained on GitHub by folks like you.


View github project
UI kit

Endless Components

Over a dozen reusable components built to provide iconography, dropdowns, input groups, navigation, alerts, and much more.

Responsive

Customizable

UI Elements

Clean Code

Browser Support

Color Pallet

Page Builder

Documentation
Expo

Built with Bootstrap

Millions of amazing sites across the web are being built with Bootstrap. Get started on your own with our growing collection of examples or by exploring some of our favorites.

100+

Screens

6.7x

Faster

12

Mockups

item.title: Slack: Where work happens
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Where Work happens


Whatever work means for you, Slack brings all the pieces and people you need together so you can actually get things done.


Get started

Already a member? Sign in

Features

Team communication for the 21st century.

Drag, drop, and share your files.

Not just your messages, but all your files, images, PDFs, documents, and spreadsheets can be dropped right into Slack and shared with anyone you want. Add comments, star for later reference, and it’s all completely searchable. If you use any services like Google Drive, Dropbox, or Box, just paste the link and that document is immediately in sync and searchable too.



Works everywhere you go

Everything in Slack—messages, notifications, files, and all—is automatically indexed and archived so that you can have it at your fingertips whenever you want. Slack also indexes the content of every file so you can search within PDFs, Word documents, Google docs, and more. With one search box and a set of powerful search operators, you can slice and dice your way to that one message in your communication haystack.



All your tools in one place.

Connect all the tools you use to Slack and avoid all that constant switching between apps. Set up your integration so that you get all your notifications directly within Slack—from support requests, code check-ins, and error logs to sales leads—all of them searchable in one central archive. If you use any services like Google Drive, Dropbox, or Box, just paste the link and that document is immediately in sync and searchable too.

Channels

Organize your team conversations in open channels. Make a channel for a project, a team, or everyone has a transparent view.

Read more

Direct Messages

Send messages directly to another and any person or to a small group of people for more focused conversations.

Read more

Calls

Take a conversation from typing to face-to-face by starting a Slack voice or video call in any Channel or Direct Message.

Read more


Reclaim your workday

Less email. More productive. Our customers see an average 48.6% reduction in internal email, helping them enjoy a simpler, more pleasant, and more productive work life.


Start now

Affordable Pricing

Slack for Teams is a single workspace for your small- to medium-sized company or team.

Free


free


Searchable messages up to 10K
10 apps or service integrations
5GB total file storage for the team

Get started

Standard


$ 6.67


Unlimited searchable message archives
Unlimited apps and service integrations
10GB file storage per team member

Get started

Plus


$ 12.50


Everything in Free & Standard, and
SAML-based single sign-on (SSO)
Compliance Exports of all messages

Get started

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Drop us an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question in the following list.

What is TheSaaS?

It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

How long does it take?

It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

What payment services do you support?

We accept all major credit cards.

Can I update my card details?

Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.

Can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.

Can I get refund?

Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.

What if I want to change plans?

It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard.

How long are your contracts?

You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.

Other questions?

We're always available at support@domain.com

item.title: Careers
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Get a Job

Get a Job


You have got the change to work and thrive with us. We are a small group of developers who wants to make a family!

You have got the change to work and thrive with us. We are a small group of developers who wants to make a family!



Open positions
Benefits

Working At TheThemeio

We want people to thrive at TheThemeio; we believe you do your best work when you feel your best. Here are a just a few benefits we’re proud to provide our team.

Health & Wellness

Full health coverage for you and your family, and a $150 monthly fitness reimbursement.

Read more

Learning & Development

Receive $500 annually towards a personal development opportunity of your choice.

Read more

Parental Leave

Full health coverage for you and your family, and a $150 monthly fitness reimbursement.

Read more
Jobs

Open Positions

Following list displays our current required positions. This list will update regularly.

Customer Support Manager San Francisco

Use your extensive knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to improve our web client, a complex in-browser application relied upon by millions of users every day. You will work with real-time data streams, engineer for performance across browsers, and delight people by making the best software we can imagine. You will collaborate closely with Product, Design, Application Engineering, and QA to spec, build, test and deploy new features. This position reports directly to the Director of Front-end Engineering.

Apply Now

Online Advertising Manager Toronto, Canada

Use your extensive knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to improve our web client, a complex in-browser application relied upon by millions of users every day. You will work with real-time data streams, engineer for performance across browsers, and delight people by making the best software we can imagine. You will collaborate closely with Product, Design, Application Engineering, and QA to spec, build, test and deploy new features. This position reports directly to the Director of Front-end Engineering.

Apply Now

Lead Product Designer New York City

Use your extensive knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to improve our web client, a complex in-browser application relied upon by millions of users every day. You will work with real-time data streams, engineer for performance across browsers, and delight people by making the best software we can imagine. You will collaborate closely with Product, Design, Application Engineering, and QA to spec, build, test and deploy new features. This position reports directly to the Director of Front-end Engineering.

Apply Now

Senior Analyst, Data Analytics Remotely

Use your extensive knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to improve our web client, a complex in-browser application relied upon by millions of users every day. You will work with real-time data streams, engineer for performance across browsers, and delight people by making the best software we can imagine. You will collaborate closely with Product, Design, Application Engineering, and QA to spec, build, test and deploy new features. This position reports directly to the Director of Front-end Engineering.

Apply Now

Senior Front-end Engineer San Francisco

Use your extensive knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to improve our web client, a complex in-browser application relied upon by millions of users every day. You will work with real-time data streams, engineer for performance across browsers, and delight people by making the best software we can imagine. You will collaborate closely with Product, Design, Application Engineering, and QA to spec, build, test and deploy new features. This position reports directly to the Director of Front-end Engineering.

Apply Now

item.title: Pricing blocks
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Pricing blocks

Develop your pages by drag and drop ready blocks

Pricing 1
Plans

Pricing

Choose any of the following plans to get start with. You can always change your plan from your account.

Personal


free


30 days free trial
Basic support
Sync to cloud database

Get started

Team


$ 9 /mo


30 days free trial
Basic support
Sync to cloud database

Get started

Business


$ 19 /mo


30 days free trial
Basic support
Sync to cloud database

Get started

Pricing 2

Choose your pricing plan

$ 29

Single template

Single template, lifetime license


Select an album

$ 99

One year membership

Get access to all templates


Sign up

$ 199

Lifetime access

Pay once, have fun forever


Sign up
Pricing 3
Pricing

Choose License Type

Choose any of the following plans to get start with. You can always change your plan from your account.

Personal

$9 /mo

Single Website
Manual Import
No Support


Get started

Team

$59 /mo

7 Websites
Auto Import
10 Hour Support


Get started

Business

$149 /mo

Unlimited Websites
Auto Import
24/7 Support


Get started

Choose any of the following plans to get start with. You can always change your plan from your account.

item.title: Contact blocks
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
Contact blocks

Develop your pages by drag and drop ready blocks

Contact 1
We received your message and will contact you back soon.

Give us a call or stop by our door anytime, we try to answer all enquiries within 24 hours on business days.

We are open from 9am - 5pm week days.

652 Main Road, Apt 12
New York, USA 10033

E: info@domain.com P: +1 (123) 456-7890 F: +1 (987) 654-3210
Contact 2

Lets Get In Touch

We received your message and will contact you back soon.
Contact 3

Contact Us

We received your message and will contact you back soon.
Seattle, WA

652 Main Road, Apt 12
New York, USA 10033

+1 (123) 456-7890
+1 (987) 654-3210

info@domain.com

Follow Us
Contact 4

Head Office

Seattle, WA

652 Main Road, Apt 12
New York, USA 10033

Phone: +1 (123) 456-7890
Fax: +1 (987) 654-3210

Email: info@domain.com

item.title: Mac Book
item.dc:creator: TheThemeio
item.content:encoded:
